mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(REVIDX, SUBJECT, CONTENT, RATE,COMID, ID) VALUES(REVIEW_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{rate},#{comId},#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT REVIDX, SUBJECT, CONTENT, RATE,COMID, ID,reg_date FROM review WHERE REVIDX=#{revIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, rate=#{rate} WHERE REVIDX=#{revIdx}
